00101 #define die_printf sys::diePrintf

00104 #ifdef __DEBUG
00105 
00106 #ifndef __DEBUG_SHORTEN_EVAL
00107  #define EVAL(X) std::cout << '(' << __FILE__ << ',' <<__LINE__ << ") <EVAL> "#X"=" << X << std::endl
00108 #else
00109  #define EVAL(X) std::cout << "<EVAL> "#X"=" << X << std::endl
00110 #endif
00111  #define DUMP(T, X) printf("<DUMP> (%s:%d): "#X"="#T"\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, X)
00112  #define HERE() printf("<HERE> (%s:%d)\n", __FILE__, __LINE__)
00113  #define TRACE(X) printf("<TRACE> (%s:%d): "#X"\n", __FILE__, __LINE__); X
00114  #define ASSERT_OR(ASSERTION, ELSE) { if (ASSERTION) { 1; } else { dbg_printf("(%s, %d): Assertion failed: "#ASSERTION"\n", __FILE__, __LINE__); ELSE; exit(EXIT_FAILURE); } }
00115 
00116 #else
00117  #define EVAL(X)    1
00118  #define DUMP(T, X) 1
00119  #define HERE()     1
00120  #define TRACE(X) X
00121  #define ASSERT_OR(A, E) 1
00122 #endif
